mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fratson Petition, discussion; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 30; "Fratson Petition. Home Office Discussion of Blood Marks."; Discusses the George Fratson case, and the evidence that was presented. Fratson confessed to the crime wrongfully, and the thumbprint evidence that was found at the scene and used in court is said not to match proving his innocence.; Daily Dispatch; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Evidence, Criminal
